Articles.Content:
OK I realize I'm spamming Welcome with all of my Campaign questions so I'll just create one thread and put them all here...

Next question on the list is:

  • Dish Antenna - Where is it? I can't seem to find one, only the Communotron 16 and 88-88. This for the Age of Satellites campaign.
That would be from ISA Mapsat plugin-powered part add-on.

Hrm, thanks @24Flixxbeatz, I think that the wiki campaign should only require stock parts. There can be an optional section for each campaign task with links to appropriate plugins.

For those looking here are two addons that help fulfill the mission requirements:

  • ISA Map Sat - Satellite paraphernalia that lets you scan planets for topographical maps and anomalies
  • Remote Tech - Create communication arrays requiring link-up satellites to control distant unmanned equipment
But since it's not specified, it's up to you how you'll pull it off.
Well, since it's a Wiki campaign, feel free to use a stock antenna and call it done.
